original_title: SYBIL WETTASINGHE ON THE UMBRELLA THIEF
overview: As a little girl, Sybil Wettasinghe would go with her grandmother to the forest early morning to bathe in the river while birds flew ahead and animals scurried about. This inspired her to create many of her childrenâ€™s stories with their distinct drawings and enchanting storytelling.
title: SYBIL WETTASINGHE ON THE UMBRELLA THIEF
